column4: I'm looking to buy some ear/headphones, just wondering if anyone has some suggestions on USB ones that work well, or if you just got jack general suggestions on what you like would be appreciated
I've always had success with whatever headsets Logitech is selling around the $15 pricerange at any given moment. But those ain't USB.

you can just plug 'em in and go? I am working on a long ass paper for school and want to quick go out and grab a pair of head phones so I can listen to music at a cofeeshop, I don't have time to mess around : )
Yep. Assuming your sound card works, anyway.
yeah, soundcard works great. Thanks a lot, I'll just go  with a jack headphone then
